title: How to read a 250-page novel in 1 hour - Quora

response.answer_text: By developing a skill called speed-reading. To do so you should learn a few things, such as prevention of subvocalization (speaking in your head), or by word-chunking (or reading multiple words at once). For further instructions you can refer to this website How to Read Faster: 10 Ways to Increase Your Reading Speed. If you can perfect this skill, you'll be able to read 20,000 words every minute!
